participants.name: Sarah Johnson
participants.description: Went to Canyon del Oro High School

messages.message:
I'm throwing a surprise party for Scott on Jan. 3rd, his birthday is on the 2nd. You're invited. We'd love to see you plus you can come see the new house. Let me know!
Sarah

OK Sat. the 3rd, 6pm is when it starts get there 5:15 to park far away. I'll have food and drinks and stuff. the theme will be batman and joker, the new stuff since we did poker last year. I cant do that again....  See you soon!
5958 W Fieldstone Drv Glendale AZ 85308
N. on 59th Ave to Arrowhead lakes take a left, take the first right but then go up to the second right to park, we live on the first right.  Yay!
